testcase.name: Add a new pet to the store
testcase.system-out: Given Add a payload with "11" "Rossie"......................................passed When I call "/v2/pet" with POST HTTP request................................passed Then I receive valid HTTP status code "200".................................passed And I verify a new pet is created "11" "Rossie" using "/v2/pet/11"..........passed

testcase.name: Remove a pet from the store
testcase.system-out: Given A pet is created "11" "Rossie" using GET HTTP Request.................passed When I call DELETE HTTP request.............................................passed Then I receive valid HTTP status code "200".................................passed And I verify pet with "11" no longer exist using GET HTTP Request...........passed

testcase.name: Add new order to buy a pet
testcase.system-out: Given Add a payload with "7" "7" "1"........................................passed When I call "/v2/store/order" with POST HTTP request........................passed Then I receive valid HTTP status code "200".................................passed And I verify order with "7" "7" "1" "placed" using GET HTTP Request.........passed
